title: Sample, "Shin", ca. 1948
medium: Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary wefts
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 30.5 x 40.6 cm (12 x 16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Hand woven sample with off-white warp and off-white and metallic gold wefts. The Hebrew letter shin is brocaded in metallic gold and shades of orange, pink and gold. Sample for the Park Synagogue, Cleveland Heights, Ohio.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, "Shin", ca. 1948.
ca. 1948. Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary wefts. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-2.
